AddIp.title: AddIp
AddIp.summary: Adds IP addresses to an Anti-DDoS Origin instance.

AddRdMemberList.title: AddRdMemberList
AddRdMemberList.summary: Adds members to a resource directory.

AttachAssetGroupToInstance.title: AttachAssetGroupToInstance
AttachAssetGroupToInstance.summary: Associates an asset with an Anti-DDoS Origin instance of a paid edition.

AttachToPolicy.title: AttachToPolicy
AttachToPolicy.summary: Associates a mitigation policy to a protected object.

CheckAccessLogAuth.title: CheckAccessLogAuth
CheckAccessLogAuth.summary: Queries whether Anti-DDoS Origin is authorized to access Simple Log Service.

CheckGrant.title: CheckGrant
CheckGrant.summary: Queries whether Anti-DDoS Origin is authorized to obtain information about the assets within the current Alibaba Cloud account.

DeleteBlackhole.title: DeleteBlackhole
DeleteBlackhole.summary: Deactivates blackhole filtering for a protected IP address.

DeleteIp.title: DeleteIp
DeleteIp.summary: Removes specific IP addresses from an Anti-DDoS Origin instance.

DescribeAssetGroup.title: DescribeAssetGroup
DescribeAssetGroup.summary: Queries the association between an asset and an Anti-DDoS Origin instance of a paid edition.

DescribeAssetGroupToInstance.title: DescribeAssetGroupToInstance
DescribeAssetGroupToInstance.summary: Queries the association between an asset and an Anti-DDoS Origin instance of a paid edition.

DescribeDdosEvent.title: DescribeDdosEvent
DescribeDdosEvent.summary: Queries the details about the DDoS attack events that occurred on an Anti-DDoS Origin instance.

DescribeDdosOriginInstanceBill.title: DescribeDdosOriginInstanceBill
DescribeDdosOriginInstanceBill.summary: Queries the bill of an Anti-DDoS Origin (Pay-as-you-go) instance.

DescribeExcpetionCount.title: DescribeExcpetionCount
DescribeExcpetionCount.summary: Queries the number of assets that are in an abnormal state and the number of Anti-DDoS Origin instances that are about to expire. The assets can be elastic IP addresses (EIPs). The assets can also be Elastic Compute Service (ECS) instances or Server Load Balancer (SLB) instances that are assigned public IP addresses.

DescribeInstanceList.title: DescribeInstanceList
DescribeInstanceList.summary: Queries the details of all Anti-DDoS Origin instances.

DescribeInstanceSpecs.title: DescribeInstanceSpecs
DescribeInstanceSpecs.summary: Queries the specifications of a specific Anti-DDoS Origin instance.

DescribeOpEntities.title: DescribeOpEntities
DescribeOpEntities.summary: Queries the operation logs of an Anti-DDoS Origin instance.

DescribePackIpList.title: DescribePackIpList
DescribePackIpList.summary: Queries the IP addresses that are protected by a specific Anti-DDoS Origin instance.

DescribeRdMemberList.title: DescribeRdMemberList
DescribeRdMemberList.summary: Queries members in a resource directory.

DescribeRdStatus.title: DescribeRdStatus
DescribeRdStatus.summary: Queries the status of the multi-account management feature.

DescribeRegions.title: DescribeRegions
DescribeRegions.summary: Queries the regions of assets that can be protected by Anti-DDoS Origin Enterprise in a specific region.

DescribeTraffic.title: DescribeTraffic
DescribeTraffic.summary: Queries traffic statistics of an Anti-DDoS Origin instance within a specific time period.

DetachFromPolicy.title: DetachFromPolicy
DetachFromPolicy.summary: Removes protected objects from a mitigation policy.

DettachAssetGroupToInstance.title: DettachAssetGroupToInstance
DettachAssetGroupToInstance.summary: Dissociates an asset from an Anti-DDoS Origin instance of a paid edition.

GetSlsOpenStatus.title: GetSlsOpenStatus
GetSlsOpenStatus.summary: Queries whether Simple Log Service is activated.

ListOpenedAccessLogInstances.title: ListOpenedAccessLogInstances
ListOpenedAccessLogInstances.summary: Queries the Anti-DDoS Origin instances for which log analysis is enabled.

ListTagResources.title: ListTagResources
ListTagResources.summary: Queries the relationship between Anti-DDoS Origin instances and tags.

ModifyPolicyContent.title: ModifyPolicyContent
ModifyPolicyContent.summary: Modifies the content of the mitigation policy.

ModifyRemark.title: ModifyRemark
ModifyRemark.summary: Adds remarks for a single Anti-DDoS Origin instance.

MoveResourceGroup.title: MoveResourceGroup
MoveResourceGroup.summary: Changes the resource group to which a cloud resource belongs.

ReleaseDdosOriginInstance.title: ReleaseDdosOriginInstance
ReleaseDdosOriginInstance.summary: Releases a pay-as-you-go Anti-DDoS Origin instance.

TagResources.title: TagResources
TagResources.summary: Add tags to Anti-DDoS Origin instances.

UntagResources.title: UntagResources
UntagResources.summary: Removes tags from Anti-DDoS Origin instances.
